data.title: The War at Home - Full Cast & Crew
data.meta_description: Learn more about the full cast of The War at Home with news, photos, videos and more at TV Guide
data.text:
1996

2 hr 4 mins

Drama

R

Watchlist

Where to Watch

Emilio Estevez directed and stars in this affecting character study about a shell-shocked soldier who returns from Vietnam to 1972 Texas, hoping to reunite with his family and start his life over. But vivid memories and nightmares of Vietnam haunt him, creating a private war for him and his troubled family. Kathy Bates, Martin Sheen, Kimberly Williams, Carla Gugino, Geoffrey Blake.
